article_text: Dr. Nabil El Sanadi became president/CEO of Broward Health, one of the country’s largest public health systems, at a difficult time for it. He came to the job well-prepared: In addition to his medical background, he wields an MBA.

article_summary:
Dr. Nabil El Sanadi became president/CEO of Broward Health, one of the country’s largest public health systems, at a difficult time for it.
He came to the job well-prepared: In addition to his medical background, he wields an MBA.
